New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

This is one partnership we are super excited about. 
We are straight in and kicking off the relationship with an exciting Panel atParis Blockchain Week. This however, is only the start of the BIG things to come after we start delving into the direction of where#stablecoinsand the capabilities thereof are heading. Our partnership withAleph Zerois definitely going to shake things up in the industry this year. 💥

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,875 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

872 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

Archblockreposted this VP, Asia Pacific & CEO Australia at Archblock I Stablecoins I Asset Tokenization This 40 minute panel discussion at the Hong Kong Web3 Festival could have gone for so much longer! We skipped the usual stablecoin 101 and jumped right into the meaty topics of use cases of stablecoins beyond crypto trading and navigating the evolving regulatory landscape. 

An absolute delight to moderate this panel with such an amazing crew:
Rita Liu,RD TechnologiesRaagulan Pathy,CirclePaul Kremsky,CumberlandJordan Dunne,WalletMore exciting developments to come in the following months and years on the stablecoin front, watch this space!Archblock

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

This is one partnership we are super excited about. 
We are straight in and kicking off the relationship with an exciting Panel atParis Blockchain Week. This however, is only the start of the BIG things to come after we start delving into the direction of where#stablecoinsand the capabilities thereof are heading. Our partnership withAleph Zerois definitely going to shake things up in the industry this year. 💥

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,905 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,916 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,036 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

1. **Regulation**: Educational initiatives in Ras Al Khaimah, digital finance regulation discussions in Georgia.
2. **Technological Advancements**: Tether's USD₮ expansion on multiple platforms.
3. **Market Trends**: Investor interest in stablecoins, seamless payment solutions.
4. **Automated Marketing**: Repetitive, promotional bot-generated content.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors prioritize stability, usability, and informed investment in cryptocurrencies, favoring stablecoins and seamless payment solutions. They value educational initiatives and regulatory compliance, reflecting a cautious and informed approach to digital finance.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include Tether's USD₮ expansion and crypto-payment collaborations, with key developments in educational initiatives in Ras Al Khaimah and digital finance discussions in Georgia. No controversies or major milestones are noted.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They focus on legitimate business growth and exhibit bot-like characteristics, such as repetitive structure and frequent use of hashtags, without promoting rapid price increases or guaranteed returns.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit characteristics of being generated by bots, such as repetitive structure, frequent use of hashtags, and promotional content with links, indicating automation rather than personal engagement.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on partnerships, new listings, and educational initiatives, indicating they are for legitimate business growth rather than manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into partnerships, new listings, and educational initiatives. They focus on legitimate business growth in the cryptocurrency market, avoiding manipulative schemes and aggressive investor behavior, and are likely bot-generated due to their repetitive structure and frequent use of hashtags.

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts focus on stablecoins, payment solutions, educational initiatives, and regulatory compliance, indicating legitimate business growth rather than manipulation. They exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, such as repetitive structure and frequent use of hashtags.

The posts lack aggressive promotion typical of manipulation schemes and do not contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups. They primarily announce partnerships, new listings, and events, which are common for marketing and informational purposes.

To improve, incorporating more personal engagement and reducing repetitive structures could enhance authenticity and user trust.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,052 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, such as lack of personal touches, repetitive promotional language, and multiple links, but this is not definitively conclusive without additional context. They focus on partnerships, compliance, and educational initiatives, lacking manipulation tactics like misleading hype or false promises.

The most important issues are the repetitive promotional language and the lack of personal touches, which are common in bot-generated content. Additionally, the inclusion of multiple links can be seen as a red flag for automated posts.

A potential improvement would be to add more personal touches and varied language to make the content appear more authentic and engaging.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

891 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, including lack of personal engagement, promotional focus, uniformity, and multiple links, suggesting automation rather than human authorship.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and lack signs of manipulation schemes like pump-and-dump or Ponzi tactics. They focus on updates about Tether's activities, partnerships, and job openings.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

They reflect investor priorities like security and sustainability, and exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content without manipulation tactics.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts focus on partnerships, technological advancements, and compliance, avoiding aggressive price promotion or unrealistic profit promises. They exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, such as lack of personal engagement and uniformity. The most important issues are the promotional focus and automation, which suggest a lack of human authorship. Additionally, the posts include multiple links and lack personal engagement. Potential improvement could involve increasing human interaction and reducing the reliance on automated content.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,151 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,174 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

893 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into **Regulation**, **Technological Advancements**, **Education**, **Sustainability**, and **Market Trends**. They focus on stability, regulatory compliance, green energy, and innovation, aligning with investor preferences for sustainable and secure investments in the cryptocurrency space.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors prioritize stability, regulatory compliance, and sustainability in cryptocurrencies, valuing educational initiatives and technological development. They avoid schemes with aggressive promotions or unrealistic profit promises, seeking reliable and transparent market practices.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include regulatory compliance, green energy in mining, and educational initiatives. The focus is on stability, sustainability, and technological advancements, with no evident controversies.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack patterns of cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes, focusing instead on stability, regulatory compliance, and technological development without aggressive price promotion or unrealistic profit promises.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit a promotional tone, repetitive calls to action, and lack personal engagement or context-specific details, all of which suggest they could be generated by bots or automated accounts.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on Tether's collaborations, compliance, and educational initiatives, with no signs of manipulation schemes like aggressive price promotion or unrealistic profit promises.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into **Regulation**, **Technological Advancements**, **Education**, **Sustainability**, and **Market Trends**. They emphasize stability, regulatory compliance, green energy, and innovation, aligning with investor preferences for sustainable and secure investments in the cryptocurrency space.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts emphasize stability, regulatory compliance, and technological development, with a focus on partnerships and educational initiatives. They lack aggressive price promotion or unrealistic profit promises, indicating no signs of pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. However, the posts exhibit a promotional tone, repetitive calls to action, and lack personal engagement or context-specific details. These characteristics suggest that the content could be generated by bots or automated accounts. To improve, incorporating more personalized and context-specific details could enhance engagement and authenticity.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts focus on promoting legitimacy and stability through partnerships, technological advancements, and educational initiatives, without showing signs of pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They exhibit a promotional tone, lack personal engagement, and include multiple links, which are characteristics often associated with bot-generated content.

The most important issues are the lack of personal engagement and the promotional tone, which could make the content seem less trustworthy. Additionally, the presence of multiple links might contribute to the perception of the content being bot-generated. 

To improve, incorporating more personal engagement and reducing the number of links could enhance the authenticity and trustworthiness of the posts.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,228 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,237 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

892 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

1. **Adoption and Integration**: Posts about expanding cryptocurrency use.
2. **Collaborations and Initiatives**: Posts on strategic partnerships.
3. **Sustainability and Innovation**: Posts on sustainable practices and technological advancements.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, such as repetitive call-to-action phrases and multiple links, but lack definitive evidence of being created by bots. They emphasize transparency, compliance, and legitimate business strategies without manipulative tactics or suspicious links. The most important issues are the repetitive nature of the content and the presence of multiple links, which are common in bot-generated posts. However, the focus on transparency and compliance suggests no involvement in manipulation schemes. Potential improvement could involve varying the phrasing and reducing the number of links to make the content appear more organic.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,245 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

903 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,261 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,266 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

906 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

prompts_output.Output: The posts do not show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts; they include specific links, detailed information, and contextually relevant content, suggesting human authorship.

prompts_output.Output:
The posts can be categorized into:

1. **Market Trends**: Bitcoin halving, stablecoins, and their impacts.

overall_prompt_summary:
The prompts focus on key aspects of the cryptocurrency market, including Bitcoin halving, stablecoins, and their impacts, as well as investor behavior and the importance of inclusive design and interoperability. They also highlight the significance of regulation, user experience, and minimizing platform "walled gardens."

The most important issues discussed are the effects of Bitcoin halving and stablecoins on the market, and the need for inclusive, seamless payment experiences to boost investor confidence. Additionally, the prompts emphasize the importance of regulatory compliance and intuitive product design for user adoption.

A potential improvement could be a deeper exploration of specific regulatory challenges and solutions in different regions.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,278 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

overall_prompt_summary:
The prompts cover various aspects of the financial and cryptocurrency sectors, including regulation, user experience, interoperability, technological advancements, investor behavior, and market trends. They emphasize the importance of licenses, compliance, and inclusive design, as well as the role of stablecoins and blockchain technology.

Key issues include the need for seamless payment experiences and connectivity across platforms, as well as the impact of Bitcoin halving on investor confidence and strategies. Additionally, the focus on stablecoins highlights their growing significance in fintech innovations and cross-border payments.

A potential improvement could be a deeper exploration of the regulatory challenges and opportunities associated with emerging financial technologies.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

They value intuitive product designs and continuous dialogue with regulators to foster trust and adoption, minimizing concerns about complex technology and platform fragmentation.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include regulatory compliance, technological advancements, and inclusive product design. Key developments are Bitcoin halving, stablecoins, and interoperability, with no controversies or manipulation tactics evident.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. The posts focus on legitimate use cases, regulatory compliance, and industry insights.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. They include specific event details, contextual industry insights, and conversational elements, indicating human authorship and promoting legitimate events.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts contain invite links to register for events, not to cryptocurrency channels or groups. They focus on legitimate use cases and regulatory compliance, showing no signs of manipulation schemes like pump-and-dump or Ponzi tactics.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Posts 1, 3, 4 cover cryptocurrency market trends (Bitcoin halving, stablecoins, industry impacts). Posts 2, 5, 6 focus on investor behavior (product design, interoperability, regulatory clarity).

overall_prompt_summary:
The outputs discuss cryptocurrency market trends, regulatory compliance, technological advancements, and investor behavior. They emphasize legitimate use cases and regulatory clarity, avoiding manipulation schemes.

The most important issues highlighted are market predictions related to Bitcoin halving and stablecoins, and the need for better product design and interoperability for investors. Regulatory compliance is also a key focus, ensuring a secure and transparent market environment. 

Potential improvement could involve providing more detailed insights into specific technological advancements and their direct impact on investor behavior.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 3,295 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

Out of all of my interviews this month, I recommend you listen to this one the most. Here it is below:https://lnkd.in/dDjT28E9#interview#Web3#Banking#Investment

On July 10,Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock, spoke withAshton Addison, CEO and Founder of Crypto Coin Show, about tokenization and Web3 infrastructure, stablecoins, and the global credit system. Watch the full interview here:https://lnkd.in/g6pJJyHg

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

prompts_output.Output: The posts do not show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts; they contain specific details, contextually relevant links, and nuanced language typical of human-generated content.
